newsitem.title: CANADA: Canada Nov weekly earnings rise 3.1 pct on year.
newsitem.headline: Canada Nov weekly earnings rise 3.1 pct on year.

text.p: The preliminary estimate of average weekly earnings for Canadian workers in all industries except agriculture and fishing rose 3.1 percent in November from a year earlier to a seasonally adjusted C$594.61, Statistics Canada said on Tuesday.
From the month before, earnings rose 0.1 percent.
Seasonally adjusted payroll employment rose 0.5 percent in November to 10.99 million from a revised 10.94 million (10.90 million) in October.
(For more information, contact Statistics Canada analyst Stephen Johnson at (613) 951-4090.)
